name: .SA9 File Extension
summary: Learn about .SA9 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SA9 file is a plugin used by Adobe Photoshop and compatible image editors. It contains the compiled code and resources that make up the Hue and Cry plugin, which includes the instructions the software uses to generate the abstract color regions, along with any built-in parameters or presets needed for the effect. Flaming Pear Software develops the Hue and Cry plugin, which generates abstract regions of color within an image.

content: Digital artists, graphic designers, and photographers who want to add unique, generative effects to their artwork are the most likely to encounter SA9 files. Users can adjust various parameters within the plugin to control the style, shape, and distribution of the color regions it creates.

instructions: SA9 files are not meant to be opened directly; instead, Adobe Photoshop or another image editor that supports the format loads the files when it starts.

To use an SA9 file with Photoshop, you must place it in the Plug-ins folder of your Photoshop installation. Once installed, the Hue and Cry effect becomes available from the Filters menu inside Photoshop, where you can apply it to any open image.
